name: Fashion
description: Ad analytics insights and benchmarks for the Fashion industry. Learn how Fashion brands optimize their advertising across Meta, Google, and TikTok.

faqs.q: What's a good ROAS for Fashion?
faqs.a: ROAS benchmarks for Fashion typically range from 3-5x depending on margins and AOV. Use metricx to track your specific ROAS and compare to industry benchmarks.

faqs.q: Which ad platforms work best for Fashion?
faqs.a: Most Fashion brands see success with Meta (Facebook/Instagram) and Google Ads. TikTok is increasingly important for reaching younger audiences.
